  • Uses of ScoreboardService in com.sportradar.factory

    Methods in com.sportradar.factory that return ScoreboardService
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ScoreboardService
    ScoreboardServiceFactory.create(Comparator<Match> matchComparator)
    Creates a scoreboard service with a custom comparator for match sorting.
    static ScoreboardService
    ScoreboardServiceFactory.createDefault()
    Creates a default scoreboard service with the standard sorting (total score descending, then most recent first).
